experiences.company: Human Computer Integration Lab, University of Chicago
experiences.title: Undergrad Research Assistant
details: Design immersive VR applications which interface with experimental haptic devices

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
details: Enhance the safety of customer and corporate data by designing and coordinating a transition between security infrastructure and policies in live, customer-facing cloud software

Facilitate internal mobility by developing a Kubernetes training curriculum for engineers from other teams and new hires, composed of written educational content and an interactive cloud application development and deployment tutorial in Confluence

experiences.company: Media, Arts, Data and Design Center at the University of Chicago
experiences.title: Hack Arts Lab (HAL) & Weston Game Lab (WGL) Technician

Managed day to day operations by administering lab resources, managing visitor appointments and chekouts, and maintaining and repairing equipment
Improved training processes by writing machine and lab procedure turorials and administering certification exams

experiences.company: Character Search, Paleontology Department at the University of Chicago
experiences.title: Lead Developer
details: Develop web-based software tool and database for conducting cladistic analysis and storing character data
Work with Paleontologist Paul Sereno to develop software to execute his novel cladistic analysis methodology

experiences.title: Graphic Designer and Web Developer
details: Create all of the company’s design materials, including logos, merchandise, social media images, and design guides
Develop the company website and manage the company’s IT administration

experiences.company: Yuval Shaked Lab at the Technion-Israel Institute of Technology
experiences.title: Website Designer and Developer
details: Designed and constructed a website for one of the Oncology Department’s Research Labs
The redesigned website increased the number of research position applicants by about 200%
Managed the website, performing regular maintenance and content updates

experiences.title: Research Intern
details: Conducted research on the GPS and automated vehicle industries for GPS sensor security startup
Prepared and presented findings to the CEO and company-wide

experiences.title: Project Management Intern
details: Developed and marketed the Cryptocurrency Community Database, a forum-like system created in Google Sheets
Produced and hosted a livestream for product marketing and community engagement on 4 social media platforms
Automated manual office processes by developing a Google Chrome extension to perform application testing functions, cutting down a task that formerly took hours to only a few seconds

experiences.company: Johns Hopkins University, Department of Neuroscience

details: Assisted researchers with statistical analysis of RNA sequencing data utilizing the language R
